TopicTitle: Are there any good IVA mods that revamp the stock capsules and pods?

Articles.Content:
This is something I've wondered about. I've seen many beautiful frameworks here for creating IVA interiors for a capsule, such as:

however what I am wondering about is if these have ever been used to revamp the IVA for the stock capsules - ideally to make it possible to pilot a craft (largely) from IVA mode just as it is possible to do so from third-person mode by manipulating the controls.

Has this been done? Or is there some reason why not, besides nobody getting around to it?
you can use DE_IVAExtension wich use Raster Prop Monitor, i'm planning to do a MAS Config for stock pods maybe in 2022 ( the time i finish APUS Shuttle system and VEXARP )
I'm just gonna post this here to not make two similar posts, is there a mod that revamps the iva of the hitchhiker, cupola and science lab?
